thread.title: Mr Happy
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Mr Happy

author: Mr Happy
title: Mr Happy
text: Many thanks for the speed of delivery, item arrived a couple of days after purchase. Item was in perfect condition as described and at a great price. Would have no reservations recommending the company and would definitely use them again,
